whyDonate.title: Why Donate?
whyDonate.paragraph: Sea Saver is an app that enables you to donate clothes to orphanages, shelters, refugee camps and anywhere else clothes are needed across Africa.

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.paragraph: Sea Saver is an app that enables you to donate clothes to orphanages, shelters, refugee camps and anywhere else clothes are needed across Africa.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUsContent.title: What is Sea Saver?
aboutUsContent.title.paragraph: Sea Saver is a web application that aims to save our polluted seas and oceans by collecting donations accross the world and use it in order to create campaigns for helping and cleaning the seas.
heroContent.title: Sea Saver
meetTeam.title: Meet the Team
meetTeam.paragraph: We are a team of a dedicated juniors working around the clock to make your life easier, we aim to save our planet at the same time, might as well join us :)

team.title: Meet the Team
team.paragraph: We are a team of a dedicated juniors working around the clock to make your life easier, we aim to save our planet at the same time, might as well join us :)

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch!
getInTouch.paragraph: For any questions or concerns you can contact us and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

aboutUsContent.vissionText: To have a better, safer, cleaner, and healthier seas.
aboutUsContent.missionText: To create an end game for ocean pollution.
